I have a budget of 500 per day for each hotel, and please recommend me the hotel with the highest rating in Paris and London.
The trip is for 5 days, from the 1st of January to the 5th of January. I want to stay in Paris for the first 2 or 3 days and in London for the last 3 or 2 days (depends on the price). Tell me the hotel names, the minimal prices for each hotel, and the minimum expense for the 5-day trip.

<function_thought>
To assist Emma Johnson with her hotel booking in Paris and London, I will first gather a list of all hotels available in Paris. Next, I will retrieve the ratings and reviews for those hotels to identify the hotel with the highest rating. I will then perform the same process for London. This will allow me to determine the minimum prices and calculate the total expense for the 5-day trip based on her budget. I will proceed with querying for hotels in Paris first. 
</function_thought>
